eu.casoftworks.jdroidlib.device

Class PackageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.casoftworks.jdroidlib.device.PackageManager

  • public class PackageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Device class; represents a device's package manager. Acts as an interface to the device's package manager and allows listing of users, packages, permissions, etc. Packages can be installed and removed via this class.
